nodes.text: Popal Howrider was a Human male who may have lived on the world of Agamar. He was the cousin of Ettal Howrider, who was said to be one of the six "beautiful women" on Agamar before being shot by Popal.
There is some uncertainty as to whether Howrider is an actual person or simply a figment of Garik Loran's imagination.
